definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: creeping things, moving things;—´[[ר]]: abs. 1Ki 5:13 +, cstr. Ho 2:20 +;—

creeping things (disting. from [[בְּהֵמָה]], [[חַיׇּה]], [[עוֹף]], [[חִפּוֹר]], [[דָּג]]) Ho 2:20, 1Ki 5:13, Ez Eze 8:10, Eze 38:20, Ge 1:24, Ge 1:25, Ge 1:26, Ge 6:7, Ge 6:20, Ge 7:14, Ge 7:23, Ge 8:17, Ge 8:19 (all P), Hb Hab 1:14 (in sim) Ps 148:10.
of sea animals, gliding things, Ps 104:25.
moving things, of all animals Ge 9:3 (P).—Cf. Dr:Hast. DB CREEPING THINGS.
